benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/admin/invoices - Trigger an invoice generation for all parked accounts

covered: Valid Request: Tests cover successful invoice generation with default parameters (TC01), with explicit offset/limit (TC02), and with all headers (TC03); no parked accounts case (TC04)
gaps: Duplicate Submission: No tests to verify idempotency or handling of repeated identical submissions.
Caching Behavior: No tests covering caching headers (e.g., ETag, Cache-Control).
Rate Limiting: No tests assessing throttling or rate-limiting under burst or high-concurrency scenarios.
Payload Validation: No explicit payload body required by API; no tests validating/denying payload bodies if introduced in future (schema/content validation).
Response payload structure validation: Tests validate content-type but not schema/fields of the JSON response.
recommendations: Add a test to verify idempotency for duplicate submissions and ensure duplicates are not produced.
Introduce tests for caching headers and validate ETag/Cache-Control behavior.
Add rate-limiting/throttling tests to ensure proper handling under high request rates.
Introduce tests that validate the JSON response schema (specific fields and formats) beyond content-type, to ensure contract stability.
Include a 500 Internal Server Error scenario to broaden server error handling coverage beyond 503.
Consider explicit payload-body validation tests if future changes introduce a request body (validate required/optional fields and types).
